name: Block Color Wood Puzzle
description:
Block Color Wood Puzzle is a free jigsaw puzzle totally. You can enjoy it everywhere, every time without need online. This offline one has game play very simple: just drag, drop and fill up all the grid. But once playing, you can’t be stopped attracted by this CLASSIC BRICK GAME.
How to play:
- Drag the WOOD blocks to move them
- Try to fit them all in the row or column
- Blocks can't be rotated
- Don't worry, no time limits
- Game will be over if there are no room to drag
